value:
I got envious of Chrom and the others
in their swimsuits, so I tried one on...$k$pLook at me now! Summoned to
another world... I didn't expect that!

I had so much fun at the resort! I
helped out a friend with body oil,
fed another one coconut brittle...$k$pI even threw lances and caught a
weird creature in a tide pool!

Put me on the front lines! This
swimsuit may not offer much
protection, I admit...$k$pBut a true tactician adjusts their
strategy along with their outfit!

I'd love it if you and I took a trip to the
sea together, someday...$k$pI don't have many memories, so I'd
love to see something besides a
battlefield.

I've been keeping my eyes peeled...
Seems like I'm one of the few who's
dressed in so little. I feel...exposed.

Greetings to you from your friend
$Nf!$k$pThis swimsuit? It'll throw off the
enemy's concentration! Tell me, can
you focus on battle right now? Nope!

My plan for summer fun is paying
off!

This clothing is so light that I can
move around with ease.

What I didn't factor in was
sunstroke...

You have plans for me? Great!
Let's tackle the summer together!

Hi, I'm Robin. I may have been on
vacation in the Outrealms...$k$pBut I can't turn my back on anyone
who needs a sound battle strategy!

We did a good job out there, despite
the heat. Did you lose focus during
the battle? No? That's good!$k$pAt the resort, fighting in the heat didn't
bother me one bit, but here...it does.
It's strange.$k$pMaybe it's because there, I was
focused on strategy! You know what
I'm talking about, don't you?$k$pI'm so glad we met. It's nice to have
another tactician to talk to. You
understand what I'm saying... $k$pI had a great time at the resort, but I
think it's even more fun to talk about
strategy like this.$k$pAnd it doesn't hurt that you're letting
me take a vacation from being a
tactician during battle!$k$pI hope we can keep talking like this...
Two tacticians, striving for the ultimate
strategy!
てやっ
えぇい！
ひゃあ！？
This is not good...
Wipeout!
Cannonball!
Now that really sizzles!
Tropical attack!
See ya...
Heehee
I'm not exactly dressed for battle, am I?
I wonder how many of our friends like swimming?
I want to show you this weird creature I found on the beach!
I think we'll have a memorable summer together.
Swimming, collecting seashells... I'll need to make a beach plan.
Awww... My tome got all wet...
Looks like it's going to be a great summer!
What's up?
Whew!
Where to?
